name: adpa-infrastructure
description: AWS CDK Infrastructure for ADPA - Autonomous Data Pipeline Agent

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy adpa-dev-stack
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && cdk deploy adpa-staging-stack
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy adpa-prod-stack --require-approval never
scripts.diff:dev: npm run build && cdk diff adpa-dev-stack
scripts.diff:staging: npm run build && cdk diff adpa-staging-stack
scripts.diff:prod: npm run build && cdk diff adpa-prod-stack

author: ADPA Team
